short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart task scheduler for Google Chrome. Organize your tasks with ease and upgrade to premium for unlimited features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IQTask - Your Smart Task Manager for Chrome! 🚀

Take control of your day with IQTask, the ultimate task organizer designed to simplify your life and boost your productivity. Whether it’s work, personal goals, or just daily reminders, IQTask makes it fun and easy to stay on top of everything.

💡 Features You'll Love:

🌟 Prioritize like a pro: Mark important tasks with a star and keep them at the top of your list.
⏱️ Set task timers: Add time limits to tasks and get visual alerts when time runs out.
✅ Complete tasks effortlessly: Cross off completed tasks—they’ll turn gray and stay out of your way.
🗑️ Delete with one click: Remove unnecessary tasks in seconds.
🔄 Sync across devices: Access your tasks on any browser with your Chrome profile.

🎉 Why Choose IQTask?
- Minimalistic and stylish interface, inspired by modern design principles.
- Works seamlessly without the need to create additional accounts.
- Perfect for busy professionals, students, or anyone looking to stay organized.

What’s Included?

🔓 Free Version:
+ Add up to 5 tasks.
+ Set a timer for 1 task at a time.

💎 Premium Version (Coming soon) (€4.99/month):
+ Add unlimited tasks and timers.
+ Remove all restrictions—plan and organize without limits.
+ Enjoy priority support and exclusive updates.

🎯 Take the first step to better productivity today! Install IQTask now and start managing your tasks like a pro. 💼
